plot: Young space warrior Takashi Shishidô protects Earth from from the destructive monsters of the Black Star as the long-haired kung-fu colossus Megaloman.
title: Megaroman
plot_es: Young space warrior Takashi Shishidô protects Earth from from the destructive monsters of the Black Star as the long-haired kung-fu colossus Megaloman.
plot_en: Young space warrior Takashi Shishidô protects Earth from from the destructive monsters of the Black Star as the long-haired kung-fu colossus Megaloman.
